WorkItem.Description:
Hello team,
I am verymuch new to GoblinXNA. I downloaded and working on Tutorial8 for AR. 
I think now only the binary markers are avilable (Only the one given in the folder ../Marker_Layout/raw_markers/ALVAR). 
How can I create my own markers? 
Like the marker with a color photo or some object with full A4 size paper.
Â 
Thanks in Advance
wizards

Comments.Message: This is not an issue, so please post your comment on discussion board. ALVAR 1.5 only supports binary (fiducials) markers, so no color photo (feature-based) tracking.
